20110118063459.000|20110118063501.000|CC1|GET ANY KILLING OUT OF ANY      
20110118063501.000|20110118063502.000|CC1|TITLE ANYWHERE.                 
20110118063502.000|20110118063503.000|CC1|>> Jon: WHAT?                   
20110118063503.000|20110118063504.000|CC1|NO.

20110118063546.000|20110118063548.000|CC1|AS JOB-DESTROYING.

20110118063550.000|20110118063552.000|CC1|MY MORE LIBERAL COLLEAGUES

20110118063554.000|20110118063558.000|CC1|EVAPORATING.

20110118063616.000|20110118063616.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY.                    
20110118063616.000|20110118063617.000|CC1|WHATEVER.                       
20110118063617.000|20110118063619.000|CC1|YOU BLEW IT.                    
20110118063619.000|20110118063620.000|CC1|JUST OUT OF CURIOSITY.          
20110118063620.000|20110118063622.000|CC1|DOES HEALTH CARE REFORM KILL,   
20110118063622.000|20110118063626.000|CC1|DESTROY, SLOWLY SOP UP JOBS?    
20110118063626.000|20110118063627.000|CC1|WELL ACCORDING TO THE           
20110118063627.000|20110118063628.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL BUDGET OFFICE IT  
20110118063628.000|20110118063631.000|CC1|WILL CREATE A .5% DECREASE IN   
20110118063631.000|20110118063632.000|CC1|THE LABOR FORCE.                
20110118063632.000|20110118063634.000|CC1|DUE TO OLDER WORKERS BEING      
20110118063634.000|20110118063635.000|CC1|ABLE TO RETIRE EARLIER BECAUSE  
20110118063635.000|20110118063637.000|CC1|THEY DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT  
20110118063637.000|20110118063639.000|CC1|THEIR HEALTH CARE AND OTHERS    
20110118063639.000|20110118063640.000|CC1|VOLUNTARILY LEAVING THEIR WORK  
20110118063640.000|20110118063642.000|CC1|FORCE OR REDUCING THEIR HOURS   
20110118063642.000|20110118063644.000|CC1|SO IT IS JOB KILLING IN THE     
20110118063644.000|20110118063645.000|CC1|SENSE THAT GETTING MORE SLEEP   
20110118063645.000|20110118063653.000|CC1|AT NIGHT IS AWAKE KILLING.      
20110118063653.000|20110118063654.000|CC1|THE ACCURACY ARGUMENT COULD     
20110118063654.000|20110118063656.000|CC1|BENEFIT THE DEMOCRATS.          
20110118063656.000|20110118063658.000|CC1|THE SEMANTIC ARGUMENT CANNOT    
20110118063658.000|20110118063700.000|CC1|BENEFIT THE DEMOCRATS.          
20110118063700.000|20110118063702.000|CC1|FOX AND FRIENDS MAKE THAT       
20110118063702.000|20110118063703.000|CC1|POINTS EXPLICIT FOR US.         
20110118063703.000|20110118063705.000|CC1|>> MR. WEANER LET'S START WITH  
20110118063705.000|20110118063705.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20110118063705.000|20110118063707.000|CC1|YOU THINK THAT THE REPUBLICANS  
20110118063707.000|20110118063708.000|CC1|ARE TONE DEAF BY CALLING IT     
20110118063708.000|20110118063710.000|CC1|THE REPEALING THE JOB-KILLING   
20110118063710.000|20110118063711.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE LAW ACT.            
20110118063711.000|20110118063711.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20110118063711.000|20110118063714.000|CC1|>> WELL IT'S NOT ONLY THE       
20110118063714.000|20110118063715.000|CC1|WRONG TONE BUT WHEN YOU LOOK    
20110118063715.000|20110118063716.000|CC1|AT WHAT'S IN THE BILL IT'S      
20110118063716.000|20110118063717.000|CC1|JUST WRONG.                     
20110118063717.000|20110118063719.000|CC1|THE BILL CREATES 300,000 NEW    
20110118063719.000|20110118063720.000|CC1|JOBS.                           
20110118063720.000|20110118063722.000|CC1|THERE ARE 160 AMENDMENTS THAT   
20110118063722.000|20110118063724.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS PUT IN THE BILL THAT  
20110118063724.000|20110118063726.000|CC1|ARE MOSTLY TAX BREAKS FOR       
20110118063726.000|20110118063727.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESSES.               
20110118063727.000|20110118063729.000|CC1|WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE FACT THAT  
20110118063729.000|20110118063730.000|CC1|THE BILL CREATES THESE NEW      
20110118063730.000|20110118063733.000|CC1|SERVICES OF PRE-EXISTING        
20110118063733.000|20110118063733.000|CC1|CONDITIONS....                  
20110118063733.000|20110118063734.000|CC1|>> MR. WEANER.                  
20110118063734.000|20110118063736.000|CC1|>> LIFETIME BENEFITS FOR        
20110118063736.000|20110118063736.000|CC1|SENIORS.                        
20110118063736.000|20110118063738.000|CC1|>> MR. WEANER WE'RE NOT         
20110118063738.000|20110118063739.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT THE BILL.         
20110118063739.000|20110118063740.000|CC1|WE'RE TALKING ABOUT THE NAME    
20110118063740.000|20110118063746.000|CC1|OF THE BILL.                    
20110118063746.000|20110118063747.000|CC1|>> Jon: HEY, MAN.               
20110118063747.000|20110118063749.000|CC1|WE DIDN'T BRING YOU ON HERE TO  
20110118063749.000|20110118063750.000|CC1|SPOUT FACTS.

20110118063752.000|20110118063752.000|CC1|WORDING.                        
20110118063752.000|20110118063753.000|CC1|LET'S TRY IT AGAIN.
